txt.en: 'Walstow was once a beautiful settlement, but we have fallen on rough times as of late. The Orcs constantly spill forth from the East Wall, and we must defend ourselves from their assaults daily. My people have begun to lose hope, and the town itself has started to fall into disrepair. I will not be moved by the violence of our foes, but I know not how long Walstow will stand without aid.'
What is the state of Walstow?
